plot outline: Sunny a movie ticket blacker.Babli love interest of Sunny a wannabe actress and Aditya a struggling actor are living their individual life.Anna a recovery agent looses his recovered amount of 20 Crore due to negligence of the trio on separate occasions .Anna gives them a deadline to return the money or else face consequences.Aditya teams up with a bank manager Vijay Mehra to con Janhavi Mazumdar for her ancestral diamonds.Sunny and Babli kidnap Aditya mistaking him to be the grandson of a lavish hotelier.
title: Ye Re Ye Re Paisa
plot: Its a story of funny misunderstandings that creates troubles for five individuals who are trying to achieve their life goals.
